english_example_sentence: You must have tried that new recipe, the food turned out very delicious.
russian_example_sentence: Ты, должно быть, попробовал тот новый рецепт, еда получилась очень вкусной.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen o yeni tarifi denemişsin, yemek çok lezzetli olmuş.
